name: Forward Roll
description: A basic tumbling skill involving a roll forward on the floor from a standing position.
shapeTip: Tuck chin to chest, round back, and push with legs.

name: Backward Roll
description: A basic rolling motion backwards, using hands and momentum to complete the skill.
shapeTip: Tuck tight, push through arms, roll over shoulders.

name: Handstand
description: A vertical hold with the body inverted, balancing on the hands.
shapeTip: Lock elbows, push tall through shoulders, engage core.

name: Cartwheel
description: A sideways tumbling skill involving a rotation over the hands from one foot to the other.
shapeTip: Lunge forward, reach long, kick legs straight over.

name: Roundoff
description: A cartwheel-like skill with a snap-down landing and feet together, often used to generate power.
shapeTip: Punch toes together, drive arms up on landing.

name: Front Walkover
description: A forward rotation through a handstand landing one foot at a time.
shapeTip: Open shoulders, push off hands, land soft in split stance.

name: Back Walkover
description: A backward rotation from standing, landing one foot at a time.
shapeTip: Reach back with control, use shoulder flexibility.

name: Standing Back Handspring
description: A backward handspring from a standing position, used as a base skill for advanced tumbling.
shapeTip: Arms by ears, sit low, jump back fast.

name: Roundoff Back Handspring
description: A roundoff leading into a back handspring to build momentum.
shapeTip: Fast snap down in roundoff and aggressive jump back.

name: Standing Back Tuck
description: A standing backflip without using the hands.
shapeTip: Jump straight up, tuck quickly, spot landing.

name: Roundoff Back Handspring Back Tuck
description: A tumbling pass ending in a back tuck after RO and BHS.
shapeTip: Strong punch from BHS to initiate the tuck.

name: Back Layout
description: A layout flip in a straight, extended body position.
shapeTip: Lift through shoulders, tight hollow position in air.

name: Roundoff Back Handspring Layout
description: A pass that ends in a layout after momentum-building skills.
shapeTip: Set high from BHS and stay stretched.

name: Full Twist
description: A layout with a full 360° twist, typically from a RO-BHS combo.
shapeTip: Set high, initiate twist after full layout extension.

name: Standing Full
description: A standing layout full twist, without forward momentum.
shapeTip: Explode vertically and twist after reaching extension.

name: Double Full
description: Two full twists in a straight body layout position.
shapeTip: Set high and twist tight while maintaining control.

name: Roundoff Back Handspring Double Full
description: A running pass into a BHS that ends in a double full twist.
shapeTip: Snap the BHS, lift and rotate quickly in layout.
